title: Veg and Veg
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Italian, Organic, Western, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Burger place on the 2nd floor of the Mercato Centrale. Makes bean patties with whole grain bread from a local bakery. There is also a large range of soups, fresh pressed juices, and sides such as roasted potatoes and salad.
